text:
4. Efficacy of Antipsychotics with Birth Control

While the previous sections discussed the potential risks associated with the

use of antipsychotic medications in conjunction with hormonal contraceptives,

this section will explore the efficacy of these combinations. A study published

in the Journal of Clinical Psychopharmacology found that the use of

antipsychotics with hormonal contraceptives was associated with improved

symptoms and quality of life in patients with schizophrenia (5).
